title: InvestmentFilter
description: A filter to apply to `investment`-type accounts (or `brokerage`-type accounts for API versions 2018-05-22 and earlier).

account_subtypes.title: InvestmentAccountSubtypes
account_subtypes.description: An array of account subtypes to display in Link. If not specified, all account subtypes will be shown. For a full list of valid types and subtypes, see the [Account schema](https://plaid.com/docs/api/accounts#account-type-schema).

items.description: Valid account subtypes for investment accounts. For a list containing descriptions of each subtype, see [Account schemas](https://plaid.com/docs/api/accounts/#StandaloneAccountType-investment).
